subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which dynasty ruled Rajasthan before the establishment of the Mughals?
question_hi: राजस्थान मुघलों की सृष्टि केंद्रस्थान को हेतु इसके बाद कौन सी संतुलन राजस्थान में राज करते थे।
C_en: Bhanwar Rao, Kachwaha, and Amer Rulers
C_hi: भंवार अलों, कचवाहा और Amer राजनेवाले
explanation_en: Bhanwar Rao, Kachwaha, and Amer were the rulers of Rajasthan before the establishment of the Mughals.
